isMoving.description: Flag indicating whether the asset is currently moving
speedLimitWarning.description: Indicates if the speed limit is adhered to.

exportData.title: Export data

description.exportOnlyFirstPage: Export only the first page of data.
description.caseOne: Export the maximum of {{maxExportRows}} rows from all {{allColumns}} columns.

caseTwo.singular: Export the maximum of {{maxExportRows}} rows from the displayed {{displayedColumns}} column.
caseTwo.plural: Export the maximum of {{maxExportRows}} rows from the displayed {{displayedColumns}} columns.

caseThree.singular: Export all data from the selected {{displayedColumns}} column of the current page.
caseThree.plural: Export all data from the selected {{displayedColumns}} columns of the current page.

description.caseFour: Export all data from all {{allColumns}} columns of the current page.

exportData.exportAllColumns: export all data from all {{allColumns}} columns
exportData.exportFirstPage: export the first page of data

validation.blankSpace: Input can only contain blank space between characters
validation.empty_string_columns_array: You have to select at least one column to search in
validation.any_URI: Value has to match validation rules for "anyURI" data type
validation.base64_binary: Value has to match validation rules for "base64Binary" data type
validation.byte: Value has to match validation rules for "byte" data type
validation.curie: Value has to match validation rules for "curie" data type
validation.day_time_duration: Value has to match validation rules for "dayTimeDuration" data type
validation.decimal: Value has to match validation rules for "decimal" data type
validation.double: Value has to match validation rules for "double" data type
validation.duration: Value has to match validation rules for "duration" data type
validation.encoding: Value has to be in "{{encoding}}" encoding
validation.fixed_point_integer: Integer part has to be {{integerLength}} digits long
validation.fixed_point_parts: Value has to consist of 2 parts separated by a dot
validation.fixed_point_scale: Scale part has to be {{scaleLength}} digits long
validation.float: Value has to match validation rules for "float" data type
validation.g_day: Value has to match validation rules for "gDay" data type
validation.g_month: Value has to match validation rules for "gMonth" data type
validation.g_month_day: Value has to match validation rules for "gMonthDay" data type
validation.g_year: Value has to match validation rules for "gYear" data type
validation.g_year_month: Value has to match validation rules for "gYearMonth" data type
validation.group_unique_values: Each value has to be unique
validation.hex_binary: Value has to match validation rules for "hexBinary" data type
validation.int: Value has to match validation rules for "int" data type
validation.integer: Value has to match validation rules for "integer" data type
validation.lang_string: Value has to match validation rules for "langString" data type
validation.length_max: Value has to have a maximum length of {{max}} characters
validation.length_min: Value has to be at least {{min}} characters long
validation.list_length_max: The list has to have a maximum length of {{max}} items
validation.list_length_min: The list has to have at least {{min}} items
validation.long: Value has to match validation rules for "long" data type
validation.negative_integer: Value has to match validation rules for "negativeInteger" data type
validation.non_negative_integer: Value has to match validation rules for "nonNegativeInteger" data type
validation.non_positive_integer: Value has to match validation rules for "nonPositiveInteger" data type
validation.number: Value has to be a valid number
validation.positive_integer: Value has to match validation rules for "positiveInteger" data type
validation.range_max_inclusive: Value has to be less than or equal to {{max}}
validation.range_max: Value has to be less than {{max}}
validation.range_min_inclusive: Value has to be greater than or equal to {{min}}
validation.range_min: Value has to be greater than {{min}}
validation.regular_expression: Value has to match the following pattern: {{pattern}}
validation.short: Value has to match validation rules for "short" data type
validation.time: Value has to match validation rules for "time" data type
validation.unsigned_byte: Value has to match validation rules for "unsignedByte" data type
validation.unsigned_int: Value has to match validation rules for "unsignedInt" data type
validation.unsigned_long: Value has to match validation rules for "unsignedLong" data type
validation.unsigned_short: Value has to match validation rules for "unsignedShort" data type
validation.year_month_duration: Value has to match validation rules for "yearMonthDuration" data type
